content.en: Spatial Multiplexing Algorithms: Researchers have been investigating various algorithms to address different research questions in the field of spatial multiplexing systems. These algorithms have been found to reduce computational complexity while still maintaining optimal performance. They achieve this by decoupling joint antenna subset selection, reducing feedback load, and selecting antenna elements based on channel characteristics. Overall, these algorithms offer significant benefits such as lower complexity, improved error performance, and attractive system performance.
content.da: Rumlig Multiplexing Algoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at besvare forskellige forskningsspørgsmål inden for området rumlig multiplexing systemer. Disse algoritmer har vist sig at reducere beregningskompleksiteten, samtidig med at de opretholder optimal ydeevne. De opnår dette ved at afkoble fælles antennedelvalg, reducere feedbackbelastningen og vælge antenneelementer baseret på kanalens karakteristika. Samlet set tilbyder disse algoritmer betydelige fordele såsom lavere kompleksitet, forbedret fejlydelse og attraktiv systemydelse.
